```{r, packages, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(jeksterslabRdatarepo)
library(knitr)
library(DT)
library(GGally)
library(plotly)
library(psych)
```

## Load Data

```{r, load}
data(
  galton,
  package = "jeksterslabRdatarepo"
)
```

## Data Table

```{r, DT, echo = FALSE}
datatable(galton)
```

## Plots

### Scatter Plot Matrix

```{r, plot01, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
p <- ggpairs(
  data = galton,
  mapping = aes(color = gender),
  columns = c(2, 3, 5, 6)
)
ggplotly(p)
```

### Father

```{r, plot02, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
plot_ly(
  data = galton,
  type = "scatter",
  mode = "markers",
  x = ~father,
  y = ~height,
  color = ~gender
)
```

### Mother

```{r, plot03, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
plot_ly(
  data = galton,
  type = "scatter",
  mode = "markers",
  x = ~mother,
  y = ~height,
  color = ~gender
)
```

## Descritive Statistics

```{r, descriptives01, echo = FALSE}
kable(
  x = summary(
    galton
  )
)
```

```{r, descriptives02, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
kable(
  x = describe(
    galton
  )
)
```
